sentences.en: As the years went by his nastiness began to annoy his readers.
sentences.cn: 年深日久，他恶毒的文字开始让读者生厌。

sentences.en: Does it annoy you if others do things less well than you would, or don't seem to try hard enough?
sentences.cn: 如果别人不如你能干，或者似乎不够努力，你会很生气吗？

sentences.en: Harry's remarks were beginning to annoy me but he saw the red light and changed the subject.
sentences.cn: 哈里的话开始使我讨厌,但他好像有所觉察,马上改变了话题.

sentences.en: He is not doing this to annoy you.
sentences.cn: 他做这件事并非是要惹你烦恼。

sentences.en: His constant joking was beginning to annoy her.
sentences.cn: 他不停地开玩笑，已开始惹她生气。

sentences.en: His temper's been changeable this week, so don't annoy him.
sentences.cn: 这星期他脾气变化无常, 所以不要惹他生气.

sentences.en: I am convinced that some people complain just to annoy me, for something to do, or they simply enjoy complaining.
sentences.cn: 我以为身边的人抱怨是为了令我烦恼、是为了解决某些事、又或者他们就是喜欢抱怨。

sentences.en: I realise now that the things which used to niggle and annoy me just don't really matter.
sentences.cn: 我现在意识到那些曾令我烦恼不快的事情其实无关紧要。

sentences.en: I sometimes think that all his supposed mistakes are made on purpose just to annoy me.
sentences.cn: 我有时认为他犯的那些被信以为真的一切错误是故意为了气我.

sentences.en: I was deliberately trying to annoy him.
sentences.cn: 我故意气他一下.

sentences.en: If you annoy me much more, I'll box your ears.
sentences.cn: 如果你再打扰我, 我将打你耳光.

sentences.en: It annoyed me that I didn't have time to do more ironing.
sentences.cn: 没有时间熨更多的衣服让我心烦了。

sentences.en: It really annoys me when I see people dropping litter.
sentences.cn: 看到别人乱丢垃圾我非常生气。

sentences.en: She annoyed him with her stupid questions.
sentences.cn: 她那些愚蠢的问题令他很恼火。

sentences.en: She sometimes does things on purpose just to annoy me.
sentences.cn: 她有时存心做些事来使我生气.

sentences.en: They infiltrated behind the lines so as to annoy the emery replacements.
sentences.cn: 他们渗透敌后以便骚扰敌军的调度.

sentences.en: They seldom rock the boat or annoy the mayor or board of aldermen with unusual budget requests.
sentences.cn: 他们很少捣乱或提出过分的预算要求来为难市长或市议会.

sentences.en: Try making a note of the things that annoy you.
sentences.cn: 试着把让你心烦的事记下来。

sentences.en: Try making a note of the things which annoy you.
sentences.cn: 试着把烦心事写下来。

sentences.en: We can annoy the enemy by air raids.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用空袭骚扰敌人。

sentences.en: We can annoy the enemy by raids.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用空袭骚扰敌人.

sentences.en: What annoyed him most was that he had received no apology.
sentences.cn: 最令他生气的是没人向他道歉。

sentences.en: You shouldn't let him annoy you so much. Cool down!
sentences.cn: 你不该为他冒这么大火,消消气吧!

words.tran_cn: 恼人地；烦人地；令人不快地（annoying的副词形式）

trans.tran_en: If someone or something annoys you, it makes you fairly angry and impatient

trans.tran_cn: 使生气， 使恼火； 打扰
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel slightly angry and unhappy about something
